snippet: A federal judge has ruled that Idaho’s law banning secret filming of animal abuse at agricultural facilities is unconstitutional.
abstract: Judge B Lynn Winmill rules that Idaho's law banning secret filming of animal abuse at agricultural facilities in unconstitutional.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge has ruled that Idaho’s law banning secret filming of animal abuse at agricultural facilities is unconstitutional.

headline.main: Idaho: Ban on Filming Animal Abuse Unconstitutional
headline.print_headline: Idaho: Ban on Filming Animal Abuse Unconstitutional
